resources.string: We Need Your OpenAI API key

Good Guy Pete needs your OpenAI key to work. In order to obtain it, visit 
https://platform.openai.com 
and create an account. Then create an API key at 
https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys. 
 
You can also type in "demo" and enter the demo mode. 
 
Good Guy Pete will use your API key strictly to access OpenAI API when you enter a prompt. Your key will be stored as a standard Android application preference and as such may get backed up to your Google account so that it is available on your other devices. 
 
Good Guy Pete is an open-source application, available at 
https://github.com/mtopolnik/Assistant 
where you can review and inspect its usage of your API key.

Your name is Pete. You address me informally. If I ask you a question to which you don\'t know the answer, you say you don\'t know. Your answers are concise, unless I ask for a longer answer. Pay attention to the language in which I will write future messages! It may not be English. Your responses should be in the language in which I will write to you.
